Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by TakeoHonorable
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Tool = script.Parent
Tool.Enabled = true
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local Remote = (Tool:FindFirstChildOfClass("RemoteEvent") or Create("RemoteEvent"){ Name = "Remote", Parent = Tool })
local MouseInput = (Tool:FindFirstChild("MousePos") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "MousePos", Parent = Tool })
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
local Player,Character,Root,Humanoid
local Animations = {}
local Particle = Handle:WaitForChild("Particle"):WaitForChild("Flare") Particle.Enabled = true
local Sounds = { Lunge = Handle:WaitForChild("Lunge"), }
local Events = {}
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function daggerUp() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function daggerOut() Tool.Grip = Tool.Grip * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90),math.rad(20),0) end
local CurrentTime,LastTime = tick(),tick() function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end Tool.Enabled = false CurrentTime = tick() if (CurrentTime-LastTime) <= 0.2 then --Lunge daggerOut() Sounds.Lunge:Play() if Animations["Lunge"] then Animations.Lunge:Play() end --Components.PeriTrail.Enabled = true local sucess,MousePosition = pcall(function() return MouseInput:InvokeClient(Player) end) MousePosition = (sucess and MousePosition) or Vector3.new(0,0,0)
local Direction = CFrame.new(Root.Position, Vector3.new(MousePosition.X, Root.Position.Y, MousePosition.Z)) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.MaxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge) BodyVelocity.Velocity = Direction.lookVector * 75 Services.Debris:AddItem(BodyVelocity, 0.5) BodyVelocity.Parent = Root delay(.5,function() --Components.PeriTrail.Enabled = false end) Root.CFrame = CFrame.new(Root.CFrame.p,Root.CFrame.p+Direction.lookVector) coroutine.wrap(function() wait(.7) daggerUp() end)() wait(1)
else --Swing if Animations["Stab"] then Animations.Stab:Play(nil,nil,5) end
end LastTime = CurrentTime Tool.Enabled = true end
function Touched(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 or FF or Hum == Humanoid then return end if IsTeamMate(Player,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then return end UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) Hum:TakeDamage(15)
if not Hum.Parent:FindFirstChild("SlowScript") then local Slow = script:WaitForChild("SlowScript"):Clone() Slow.Parent = Hum.Parent Slow.Disabled = false end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Root = Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not Root then return end Animations = { Lunge = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild("Animations"):WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("Lunge")), Stab = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild("Animations"):WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("Stab")), TimeStop = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild("Animations"):WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("TimeStop")), }
Events[#Events+1] = Handle.Touched:Connect(Touched) end
function Unequipped() for _,anim in pairs(Animations) do if anim then anim:Stop() end end for _,sound in pairs(Sounds) do if sound then sound:Stop() end end for i=1,#Events do if Events[i] then Events[i]:Disconnect() end end Events = {} end
Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
Remote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(Client,Key) if not Player or not Client or Client ~= Player or not Key or not Tool.Enabled then return end if Key == Enum.KeyCode.Q and Particle.Enabled then local function IsStoppingTime() local TimeScripts = Services.ServerScriptService:GetChildren()
for i=1,#TimeScripts do if TimeScripts[i] and TimeScripts[i].Name == tostring(script:FindFirstChild("TimeStop")) and TimeScripts[i]:IsA("Script") and TimeScripts[i]:FindFirstChild("Creator") and TimeScripts[i]:FindFirstChild("Creator").Value == Player then return true end end
return false end
if IsStoppingTime() then return end Particle.Enabled = false delay(30,function() Particle.Enabled = true end) --print("Time Stops now!") Animations.TimeStop:Play() local TimeStopScript = script:FindFirstChild("TimeStop") if TimeStopScript then TimeStopScript = TimeStopScript:Clone()
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Player, Parent = TimeStopScript } Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "CenterPart", Value = Root, Parent = TimeStopScript }
TimeStopScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService TimeStopScript.Disabled = false end end end)

local vCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
if myHumanoid and myHumanoid.Health > 0 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 9.0 wait(2.5) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
wait(2.0) if script then script:Destroy() end

--TIME STOP!! --Inspired from some anime :)
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
local Root,Creator = script:FindFirstChild("CenterPart"),script:FindFirstChild("Creator")
local Properties = { Range = 80, Duration = 5, --Measured in seconds TimeDifference = 0 } if not Root or not Root.Value or not Creator or not Creator.Value then script:Destroy() end
local Sounds = { TimeStop = script:FindFirstChild("TimeStop"), TimeWave = script:FindFirstChild("TimeWave") }
local timeWave = Create("Part"){ Size = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), CastShadow = false, Transparency = 1, CanCollide = false, Locked = true, Anchored = true }
local Wave = script:FindFirstChild("Wave")
if Wave then Wave.Face = Enum.NormalId.Top Wave.Parent = timeWave local Clone = Wave:Clone() Clone.Face = Enum.NormalId.Bottom Clone.Parent = Wave end
timeWave.Parent = workspace
if Sounds.TimeWave then Sounds.TimeWave.Parent = timeWave Sounds.TimeWave:Play() end
if Creator and Creator.Value and Creator.Value:IsA("Player") and Creator.Value.UserId == 30349282 then Properties.Range = 2048 end
local LastPosition = Root.Value.CFrame for i=0,60*1.5,1 do if Root.Value then timeWave.Size = Vector3.new(1,0,1) *((i/(60*1.5))*Properties.Range) timeWave.CFrame = Root.Value.CFrame LastPosition = Root.Value.CFrame Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() end end
if Wave then timeWave:Destroy() end
local TimeBubble = Create("Part"){ Locked = true, Anchored = true, CastShadow = false, CanCollide = false, Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball, Color = Color3.fromRGB(170, 85, 0), Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * 0, Transparency = 0, Material = Enum.Material.Neon, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, CFrame = LastPosition, Parent = workspace, }
local FFBubble = TimeBubble:Clone() FFBubble.Material = Enum.Material.ForceField FFBubble.Transparency = 0.1 FFBubble.Color = Color3.new(1,1,0) FFBubble.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*0 FFBubble.Parent = TimeBubble
local shrinkbubble = FFBubble:Clone() shrinkbubble.Color = Color3.new(1,1,1) shrinkbubble.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*0 shrinkbubble.Parent = FFBubble
if Sounds.TimeStop then Sounds.TimeStop.EmitterSize = Properties.Range Sounds.TimeStop.Parent = TimeBubble Sounds.TimeStop:Play() end
--FREEZE EVERYTHING UNANCHORED!!
local Pos,Neg = LastPosition.p + Vector3.new(1,1,1) * Properties.Range*.5,LastPosition.p - Vector3.new(1,1,1) * Properties.Range*.5
local Parts = workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new(Neg,Pos),{Creator.Value.Character},math.huge)
local AnchoredParts = {}
local function LockPlayer(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if not Hum or Hum.Health<=0 or FF or IsTeamMate(Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent),Creator.Value) then return end
local function DimensionBroken(Character) -- Quick check to see if they're not frozen for _,v in pairs(Services.ServerScriptService:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Script") and v.Name == "BreakDimension" and v:FindFirstChild("Target") and v:FindFirstChild("Target").Value == Hum.Parent then return true end end return false end
if DimensionBroken() then return end
local DimensionScript = script:WaitForChild("BreakDimension"):Clone()
Create("NumberValue"){ Name = "Duration", Value = (Properties.Duration-Properties.TimeDifference), Parent = DimensionScript, } Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Target", Value = Hum.Parent, Parent = DimensionScript } Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Creator.Value, Parent = DimensionScript } DimensionScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService DimensionScript.Disabled = false local parts = Hum.Parent:GetDescendants() for i=1,#parts do if parts[i] and parts[i]:IsA("BasePart") then AnchoredParts[#AnchoredParts+1] = parts[i] parts[i].Anchored = true end end end
local Touch = TimeBubble.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent or hit.Anchored or (Creator.Value.Character and Creator.Value.Character:IsAncestorOf(hit)) then return end local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if FF then return end if Hum and IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then return end if (hit.Parent:IsA("Accoutrement") or hit.Parent:IsA("Tool")) and hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then return end AnchoredParts[#AnchoredParts+1] = hit hit.Anchored = true LockPlayer(hit) end)
for i=1,#Parts,1 do if Parts[i] and Parts[i].Parent and not Parts[i].Anchored and (Parts[i].Position-TimeBubble.Position).Magnitude <= Properties.Range then local Hum,FF = Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if not FF then if Parts[i] and Parts[i].Parent and Parts[i].Parent.Parent and not Parts[i].Parent.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then AnchoredParts[#AnchoredParts+1] = Parts[i] Parts[i].Anchored = true end
if Hum and not IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then
LockPlayer(Parts[i]) end end end end
local shrinktween pcall(function() Services.TweenService:Create(TimeBubble,TweenInfo.new(.2,Enum.EasingStyle.Back,Enum.EasingDirection.Out,0,false,0),{Transparency = .7,Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.Range}):Play() Services.TweenService:Create(FFBubble,TweenInfo.new(.2,Enum.EasingStyle.Back,Enum.EasingDirection.Out,0,false,0),{Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.Range}):Play() shrinktween = Services.TweenService:Create(shrinkbubble,TweenInfo.new(.2,Enum.EasingStyle.Back,Enum.EasingDirection.Out,0,false,0),{Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.Range}):Play() wait(.2) Services.TweenService:Create(shrinkbubble,TweenInfo.new(2.3,Enum.EasingStyle.Quint,Enum.EasingDirection.In,0,false,0),{Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*0}):Play() -- = Services.TweenService:Create(shrinkbubble,TweenInfo.new(.2,Enum.EasingStyle.Back,Enum.EasingDirection.Out,0,false,0),{Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.Range}):Play().Completed:Wait() end)
coroutine.wrap(function() Properties.TimeDifference = Properties.TimeDifference + (1/60)--Helps scale the time stunned Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() end)()
wait(Properties.Duration+2.5)
if Touch then Touch:Disconnect() end
for i=1,#AnchoredParts,1 do if AnchoredParts[i] then AnchoredParts[i].Anchored = false end end
pcall(function() Services.TweenService:Create(FFBubble,TweenInfo.new(.5,Enum.EasingStyle.Back,Enum.EasingDirection.In,0,false,0),{Transparency = 1,Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*0}):Play() Services.TweenService:Create(TimeBubble,TweenInfo.new(.5,Enum.EasingStyle.Back,Enum.EasingDirection.In,0,false,0),{Transparency = 1,Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*0}):Play() end) wait(1) if TimeBubble then TimeBubble:Destroy() end
--print("Finished executing the move") script:Destroy()

function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Target = script:WaitForChild("Target").Value
local Duration = script:WaitForChild("Duration").Value if not Target or not Duration then script:Destroy() end
local Humanoid = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Humanoid:UnequipTools()
local Stop = false coroutine.wrap(function() repeat Humanoid.JumpPower = 0 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:Wait() until Stop end)()
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), }
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then
local TimeGrayScale = script:WaitForChild("GrayScale") TimeGrayScale.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Create("NumberValue"){ Name = "Duration", Value = Duration, Parent = TimeGrayScale } TimeGrayScale.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(TimeGrayScale,Duration+5) if TimeGrayScale:FindFirstChildOfClass("ColorCorrection") then delay(Duration+5,function() if TimeGrayScale:FindFirstChildOfClass("ColorCorrection") then TimeGrayScale:FindFirstChildOfClass("ColorCorrection"):Destroy() end end) --Services.Debris:AddItem(TimeGrayScale:FindFirstChildOfClass("ColorCorrection"),Duration+5) end local Disable = script:WaitForChild("DisableBackpack") Disable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Disable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Disable,1) Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target).CharacterRemoving:Connect(function(Char)--keeps people from a hidden inventory local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end) --[[repeat Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until not TimeGrayScale or not TimeGrayScale.Parent]] end
wait((Duration or 5)+2.5)
Stop = false if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end
Humanoid.JumpPower = 50 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
script:Destroy()

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false)

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)

--Time stop visual effect --Made by TakeoHonorable
local GrayScale,Duration = script:WaitForChild("GrayScale"),script:WaitForChild("Duration")
local Services = { TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), }
GrayScale.Parent = workspace.CurrentCamera local InTween = Services.TweenService:Create(GrayScale,TweenInfo.new(.5,Enum.EasingStyle.Linear,Enum.EasingDirection.Out,0,false,0),{Saturation = -1}) InTween:Play() InTween.Completed:Wait() wait(Duration.Value) Services.TweenService:Create(GrayScale,TweenInfo.new(.5,Enum.EasingStyle.Linear,Enum.EasingDirection.Out,0,false,0),{Saturation = 0}):Play()

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)

local Tool = script.Parent
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote",10)
local MouseInput = Tool:WaitForChild("MousePos",10)
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
function Primary(actionName, inputState, inputObj) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(Enum.KeyCode.Q) end end
function Equipped() Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end
Services.Input:BindAction("Primary",Primary,true,Enum.KeyCode.Q,Enum.KeyCode.ButtonX) Services.Input:SetTitle("Primary","Time Stop") Services.Input:SetPosition("Primary",UDim2.new(.5,0,-.5,0)) end
function Unequipped() Services.Input:UnbindAction("Primary") end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
function MouseInput.OnClientInvoke() return game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end
